rateLimit.title: Rate Limited
rateLimit.modalDescription: You've reached your Claude Code usage limit for this period.
rateLimit.autoSwitchingDescription: Claude will restart with your other account automatically
rateLimit.usageRestored: Your usage will be restored at this time
rateLimit.otherSubscriptions: You have other Claude subscriptions configured. Switch to continue working:
rateLimit.addAnotherSubscription: Add another Claude subscription to automatically switch when you hit rate limits.
rateLimit.willOpenLogin: This will open Claude login to authenticate the new account.
rateLimit.upgradeDescription: Upgrade your Claude subscription for higher usage limits.

kanban.title: No Tasks Yet
kanban.description: Create your first task and let the AI do the coding work for you.
kanban.tip1: Describe what you want to build in natural language
kanban.tip2: The AI will analyze your codebase and create an implementation plan
kanban.tip3: Each task runs in its own Git branch for safe experimentation

ideation.title: Generate Feature Ideas
ideation.description: Let the AI analyze your project and suggest meaningful improvements.
ideation.tip1: The AI examines your existing code structure
ideation.tip2: Suggestions are tailored to your project's technology stack

roadmap.title: Plan Your Project
roadmap.description: Create a development roadmap with AI-assisted prioritization.
roadmap.tip1: Prioritize features based on impact and effort
roadmap.tip2: The AI helps estimate complexity and dependencies

terminals.title: No Active Agents
terminals.description: Start a task to see AI agents working in real-time.
terminals.tip1: Each task gets its own terminal showing live progress
terminals.tip2: You can monitor multiple agents working in parallel

whatIs.title: What is Auto-Claude?
whatIs.description: Auto-Claude is an autonomous AI coding assistant that turns your ideas into working code. Describe what you want to build in natural language, and the AI handles everything: analyzing your codebase, creating implementation plans, writing code, and testing. Each task runs in its own Git branch, so you can experiment safely.

kanban.title: Task Management
kanban.description: Create and track coding tasks through a visual Kanban board. Each task progresses through stages from specification to completion.
kanban.step1: Create a new task with a natural language description
kanban.step2: AI analyzes your codebase and creates a plan
kanban.step3: AI implements the solution in an isolated branch

ideation.title: Feature Ideation
ideation.description: Let AI analyze your project and suggest meaningful improvements based on your existing code structure.

roadmap.title: Project Roadmap
roadmap.description: Plan your development with AI-assisted prioritization and effort estimation.

terminals.title: Agent Terminals
terminals.description: Watch AI agents work in real-time. Each task has its own terminal showing live progress.
terminals.step1: Start a task to activate an agent
terminals.step2: See live output as AI works

git.title: Git Integration
git.description: Every task runs in its own Git branch. Safe experimentation with easy rollback.
git.step2: All changes are committed with clear messages
git.step3: Merge or discard branches as needed

getStarted.title: Ready to Start?
getStarted.description: Here's how to create your first task:
getStarted.step2: Describe what you want to build
